Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

SamPy.resolve.miscÂ¶

basicReduction Basic reduction steps for SOAR image slicer data.
combine Simple script to median combine FITS files.
combineImages Combines FITS images using the imcombine IRAF task.
findSlitmaskPosition
findslits Fits slit image to a direct image to find x and y positions.
findSlitsDirectImage Fits slit positions to a direct image to find sky positions and a rotation angle.
fluxCalibrateToSDSS This script can be used to flux calibrate an image slicer 2D spectra to SDSS one (of the same target).
generateFileLists Contains a class that can be used to generate file lists from SOAR data
modifyArcs Modifies arc FITS files to include a sky line from the science image.
SplitSlicerImages Splits image slicer FITS files to separate file, one for each slice.
transform Transforms science data to either linear or log scale using IRAF and arc files for dispersion solution.
